name: Honeydew Granite
keywords: dessert, side dish, gin, honeydew, summer, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1/2 medium, ripe honeydew melon, peeled, seeded and cut into 1/2-inch cubes (about 4 cups)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the sugar and water in a saucepan over medium heat. Boil, reduce heat and simmer for 5 minutes. Set aside until cool.
Process the melon, sugar syrup and lemon juice in a blender until smooth. Add the gin and pepper and blend until well mixed.
Pour the mixture into a large, nonreactive pie plate and place in the freezer. Stir every 30 minutes until frozen. Scrape up the granite, divide among 4 dishes and serve.
